title: Opacity
desc: Whether or not to enable opacity in the simulation

title: Azimuth
desc: The POV angle lateral to the x-axis

title: Distance per Pixel
desc: Distance in simulation between pixels, specifies magnitude of zoom

title: Step Size
desc: Magnitude of the integration stepsize. Increase for performance

title: Dynamic Range
desc: Number of orders of magnitude to span in the display. Decrease to increase contrast
